contentrichtext.text: __NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__ {| cellspacing=3 width="100%" |bgcolor="#fffff6" colspan="2" style="border: 1px solid black;padding-left:1em;"| ==Goings-on in the week starting Sunday May 9 2004== *'''Evolutionary Biology''' - a new [[Wikipedia:WikiProject|WikiProject]]: "[[Wikipedia:WikiProject Evolutionary biology|WikiProject Evolutionary biology]]" has been formed to help coordinate the writing of articles related to [[evolutionary biology]]. * '''Webby Honors''' - [[Wikipedia]] wins the [[Webby Award]] 2004 in the category "Community". [http://www.webbyawards.com/main/webby_awards/winner_list.html (winner's list)]. Please help to write the [[Wikipedia:Press releases/May 2004|Press release]]. * '''Nick Berg''' - A great deal of controversy and discussion ensues regarding the inclusion or exclusion of images on [[Nick Berg]], prompting discussion on how to deal with potentially offensive images. See [[Talk:Nick Berg]], [[penis]], [[clitoris]] and [http://meta.wikipedia.org/wiki/Offensive_content Meta:Offensive content]. *'''Administrators''' - [[User:AlainV|AlainV]], [[User:Andrew Yong|Andrew Yong]], [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]], [[User:David.Monniaux|David.Monniaux]], [[User:Everyking|Everyking]], [[User:Guanaco|Guanaco]], [[User:Jfdwolff|Jfdwolff]] and [[User:Jmabel|Jmabel]] become [[wikipedia:administrators|administrators]]. Congratulations! *'''Pic of the day''' - to get a [[Wikipedia:Featured pictures|featured picture]] on your user page every day, add the text <nowiki>{{msg:pic_of_the_day}}</nowiki>, which will dynamically load [[Template:Pic of the day]]. ===Arbitration committee=== *'''[[Wikipedia:Arbitration Committee|Arbitration committee]]''' matters continuing this week: [[Wikipedia:Requests for arbitration/Wik2|Wik2]], [[Wikipedia:Requests for arbitration/Mav v. 168|Mav v. 168]], [[Wikipedia:Requests for arbitration/JRR Trollkien|JRR Trollkien]], and [[Wikipedia:Requests for arbitration/ChrisO and Levzur|ChrisO and Levzur]]. *In the cases of [[Wikipedia:Requests for arbitration/Wik2|Wik2]] and [[Wikipedia:Requests for arbitration/JRR Trollkien|JRR Trollkien]], discussion has reached the stage where the arbitrators are voting on proposed findings of fact and remedies. ===Association of Members' Advocates=== <!--===WikiProjects===--> |- valign="top" |bgcolor="#fffff6" style="border: 1px solid black;padding-left:1em;"| '''Articles featured on the [[Main Page]]''' * [[European Union]] (May 9) * [[Chess]] (May 10) * [[Taiwanese (linguistics)]] (May 11) * [[Western movie]] (May 12) * [[Floppy disk]] (May 13) * [[Triangle]] (May 14) * [[Heavy metal umlaut]] (May 14) * [[Montreal Canadiens]] (May 15) |bgcolor="#fffff6" style="border: 1px solid black;padding-left:1em;"| '''[[Wikipedia:Featured articles|Articles]] that gained "featured" status''' * [[Triangle]] (May 10) * [[Sid McMath]] (May 10) * [[Weather lore]] (May 10) * [[President of Ireland]] (May 10) * [[Crash test dummy]] (May 10) * [[Submarine]] (May 10) * [[Jim Thorpe]] (May 12) '''[[Wikipedia:Featured pictures|Pictures]] that gained "featured" status''' * [[:Image:Radcliffe-camera-oxford.jpg|Radcliffe Camera]] (May 15) * [[:Image:Abbey-of-senanque-provence-gordes.jpg|Abbey of Senanque]] (May 15) |} {{Goings-on}} [[Category:Wikipedia goings-on|{{#ifeq:{{PAGENAME}}|{{BASEPAGENAME}}|*|{{#time:Y-m-d|{{SUBPAGENAME}}}}}}]][[es:Wikipedia:Resumen de la semana del 10 de mayo de 2004]]
